tweak.tweakDescription: Anemone and Snowboard theme that brings the Adobe Icon style to iOS. (Inverted)
tweak.tweakChangelog: • 2.3 contains icons requested by donation. Please contact me on twitter if you have any requests! • Added icons for Conexus Banking App, Overwatch League App, Dexter App, CIBC Banking App, DANZ, The Impossible Game, Provenance, Junecloud Deliveries, Movie Times, TV Times, Microsoft RDP, Timer+, NHL, BloonSTD 6, Patreon, Playstation app, Charge, NLL, Filebrowser Biz, Weather Network, Apps Manager (Tigi), UFC, XE Currency, Yahoo Fantasy, Colloquoy, Keybase, FSync(), and RU Mail Cloud.
